price: A koliko smo naroda prije ovih uništili, koji su moćniji od njih bili, pa su po svijetu utočište tražili – od propasti spasa ima li!?
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا فَنَقَّبُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ هَلۡ مِن مَّحِيصٍ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wakam ahlaknā qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu min'hum baṭshan fanaqqabū fī al-bilādi hal min maḥīṣin
